unpublishedAction.name: CreateEmployee
jsonPathKeys:
{
		name: EmployeesTable.newRow?.name,
		department: GetAllDepartments.data[GetAllDepartments.data.map(e => e.name).indexOf(EmployeesTable.newRow?.department)]?.id,
		pin: EmployeesTable.newRow?.pin,
		admin: EmployeesTable.newRow?.admin,
		supervisor: EmployeesTable.newRow?.supervisor,
	}
